full_description:
AUKEY PB-N73S Basix Slim 10000mAh 18W PD Power Bank

The AUKEY PB-N73S Basix Slim 10000mAh 20W PD Power Bank is a highly efficient and compact charging solution with 18W fast charging, allowing devices such as the iPhone to be charged at full speed. Its incredibly thin and compact design makes it simple to carry, easily sliding into pockets or purses for convenience when on the road. It can fully charge an iPhone 15 twice because of its large 10000mAh capacity, which makes it a dependable companion for prolonged amounts of time spent without a power source. With its two USB-A and one USB-C connector, the AUKEY PB-N73S 10000mAh 18W PD Power Bank can charge up to three devices at once. Micro USB (5V 2A / 9V 2A) and USB-C (5V 3A / 9V 2A) are the available input options. The available output options are USB-C (5V 2.4A / 9V 2.22A / 12V 1.67A (18W PD) and USB-A (5V 3A / 9V 2A / 12V 1.5A / 18W QC3.0). Efficient power distribution is ensured by capping the highest power output at 18W. Convenience and assurance are provided by the clear battery level indicator, which makes it simple for users to keep an eye on the battery's condition. To further ensure the safety of the power bank and the devices being charged, the AUKEY PB-N73S Basix Slim 10000mAh 18W PD Power Bank is outfitted with many safety features, such as defenses against short circuits, overvoltage, overcurrent, and overheating.

Buy AUKEY PB-N73S Basix Slim 10000mAh 18W PD Power Bank from Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get original AUKEY PB-N73S Basix Slim 10000mAh 18W PD Power Bank From Star Tech. We have a large collection of latest AUKEY Power Bank to purchase. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The AUKEY PB-N73S Basix Slim 10000mAh 18W PD Power Bank comes with 1-year warranty.
